1.title: Seeing White Podcast Series
1.subtitle: Just what is going on with white people? Police shootings of unarmed African Americans. Acts of domestic terrorism by white supremacists. The renewed embrace of raw, undisguised white-identity politics. Unending racial inequity in schools, housing, criminal justice, and hiring. Some of this feels new, but in truth it’s an old story.

1.title: RayTec Audio
1.subtitle: RayTec, wherever you go, your soundtrack should follow. Music has changed the world. It's a form of expression and should be heard at the highest, premium level. When you hear music that you like, when you're listening to a book of your choosing, you get excited, or motivated or you may become active.

products.name: RayTec Airpods
products.description: Ideal for hands free activities: Exercising, phone calls, music, working, audio books, and tuning the world out!

products.name: RayTec Watch6 — Black Case
products.description: Make bluetooth calls through your watch for hands free communication. Read messages and notifications through this watch: Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp and more.

products.name: RayTec-C10 Headphones
products.description: Comfy on the ears, Adjustable to fit on your head, Foldable, Chargeable, Super bass

2.title: What Happened in Kenosha, WI?
2.subtitle: Cellphone video of the incident shows police officers in Kenosha, Wisconsin shooting a Black man multiple times on August 23 as he tried to get into a vehicle. Read more about the incident and the protests that followed here.

2.title: Sorella
2.subtitle: Sorella was founded by two Boss Babes, Heather Sanders & Brittney Turner in 2012. We were 20 years old with no fashion background or training but a lot of hustle and drive! Starting with an inventory of 10 products and packing packages on the floor of our apartment, we never imagined how far we would get!

products.name: Orange Tie Dye Pant Set
products.description: Orange Tie Dye Pant Set

products.name: Nude Square Toe Heeled Sandal
products.description: Our Nude Square Toe Heeled Sandal will accompany any outfit just perfectly. A thong style sandal featuring a square toe front with the overall perfect nude to match all your fits.

products.name: Swish Seen It All T-Shirt
products.description: Shirt reads "I'm familiar with every ghetto". Shirts run oversize. For regular fit, we recommend going a size down

3.title: The New Jim Crow
3.subtitle: The New Jim Crow is a stunning account of the rebirth of a caste-like system in the United States, one that has resulted in millions of African Americans locked behind bars and then relegated to a permanent second-class status—denied the very rights supposedly won in the Civil Rights Movement.

3.title: Justice For Tony McDade
3.subtitle: Tony McDade was a transgender black man who got killed by police in Tallahassee. Sign this petition and encourage others to do so as well to get his name out there.

4.title: Eb + Flo Boutique
4.subtitle: Eb and Flo started out as just a vision and manifested in 2020. Our CEO, Ebony Hunter, is a strong believer in living out your dreams while not only looking good but feeling good too. Our mission is to provide styles that flow with you from moment to moment, whether you’re making a quick run to the grocery store or meeting the girls for brunch. With comfort and quality in mind, we make looking lavish easy. Look good, feel good.

products.name: Effortless Cotton Joggers
products.description: The perfect cozy essential to keep you warm through the colder months and beyond. Super soft inner lining, thick material (no see-through over here!) plus it has deep pockets.  Deep enough to hold huge stacks of money or an iPhone

products.name: Tedy Soft Sherpa Jacket
products.description: The warmest and most comfortable jacket you'll ever own! The Teddy Sherpa Jacket feels like a warm hug or like you're wearing a blanket. Features a drawstring hem that allows you to snatch that waist hunny *snap*snap*

products.name: "Thou shall not try me" T-Shirt
products.description: Mood 24:7! Let the folks know the deal in this super soft tee.

4.title: Justice for Jacob Blake
4.subtitle: Jacob Blake is a loving father of 6 that deserves proper medical attention and legal representation. The funds raised through this Gofundme will go toward Jacob’s medical bills, family expenses, legal representation, support for his children and therapy costs.

5.title: The Get Real Movement
5.subtitle: Get REAL is a Canadian non-profit that combats LGBTQ+ discrimination and promotes acceptance in schools, summer camps, and workplaces. Our merchandise helps fund our work! Every order is shipped with a piece of feedback written by real students across Canada who have participated in one of our workshops

products.name: No Homophobia T-Shirt
products.description: This piece is a statement. It's a statement about what we believe, what we do, and who we are.

products.name: Love is Love Tank
products.description: Love Is Love Is Love Is Love.

products.name: Retro Pride 2018 Tank Top
products.description: This is a print collaboration with artist Emily Deechaleune.

5.title: Harrison Blake Apparel
5.subtitle: Harrison Blake Apparel has found a way to deliver high quality men's accessories at a great price. The style and variety of products are sure to please any gentleman.

products.name: Berry Dot Necktie
products.description: A great microfiber necktie - in a beautiful design and color scheme = priceless! Grab yours now. Get compliments later...

products.name: Black Tooth Bow Tie
products.description: A self-tied bow tie is a classic accessory that everyone needs in their wardrobe. Handmade quality is what you'll find in all our neckwear offerings.

products.name: Gold Circle and Star Earrings
products.description: Unique, Elegant and Simple design. Add a nice touch to complete your look for any occasion. All of our jewelry is silver or gold plated and hypoallergenic.

6.title: Mojo Jojo Pickles
6.subtitle: Mojo Jojo Pickles was started in 2011 as a commercial venture of a Slow Food Edmonton Canning Bee project Johwanna "Jojo" Alleyne started in 2010. Mojo Jojo Pickles has expanded to include many creative acidified and spirited preserved foods from pickles to condiments, beverage syrups, and shrubs.

products.name: Popular Pickle Pack
products.description: A collection of our most popular pickles: kim chi style brussels sprout, traditional pickled carrot, pickled snow pea, and lemon balsamic asparagus.

products.name: Brandied Saskatoon Berries
products.description: Whole Alberta Saskatoons in a cane sugar and whisky syrup.  Great for breakfast, desserts and cocktails.

products.name: Gingerbread Apple Butter
products.description: These fruit butters are made by slow-cooking fruit and cane sugar until it forms a thick creamy paste. We then add real vanilla and spice to enhance these flavours. Great on toast or pancakes but Divine with fine cheese.

6.title: POWERHANDZ
6.subtitle: POWERHANDZ is a global company that manufactures unique skill development products used by thousands of professional and youth athletes in multiple sports.

products.name: Basketball Gift Set
products.description: Set includes POWERHANDZ Gloves, DribbleSleeve, Wristband, and Bag

products.name: Football Gift Set
products.description: Set includes POWERHANDZ Gloves, Wristband, and Bag.

products.name: POWERHANDZ Resistance Bands and Sliders
products.description: Set includes 5 resistance bands, 2 sliding disks, and a bag for storage.

7.title: Bessie Smith, The Empress of the Blues
7.subtitle: She was big and brown and built high off the ground — "a hell of a woman," men called her, but most women said she was "rough." And while there were other blues singers in the first half of the 20th century — some who shared her surname — none could be mistaken for Bessie Smith.

7.title: Coral Oral
7.subtitle: Not only are these toothbrushes more aesthetically pleasing, you differentiate each brush by its pattern and not by its color. Our company is proudly black owned and highlights oral health facts including a Black history fact that we all should know!

products.name: Medium 4-Pack
products.description: A full brush head and precision cut bristles to reach the tooth's total surface. Gently cleans and massages gums, tongue and teeth. Medium bristles sure not to cause any damage or pain!

products.name: Soft Single-Pack
products.description: A full brush head and precision cut bristles to reach the tooth's total surface. Gently cleans and massages gums, tongue and teeth. Soft bristles sure not to cause any damage or pain!

products.name: Medium Single-Pack
products.description: A full brush head and precision cut bristles to reach the tooth's total surface. Gently cleans and massages gums, tongue and teeth. Medium bristles sure not to cause any damage or pain!

8.title: TGEU International Women’s Day - Inclusivity Media Statement
8.subtitle: On the occasion of the International Women’s Day (IWD) on 8 March, TGEU joins the voices of trans people around the world in denouncing oppression, violence, and hate against women and non-binary people in all spheres of life.

8.title: #ChooseToChallenge - International Women's Day
8.subtitle: A challenged world is an alert world. Individually, we're all responsible for our own thoughts and actions - all day, every day. We can all choose to challenge and call out gender bias and inequality. We can all choose to seek out and celebrate women's achievements. Collectively, we can all help create an inclusive world. From challenge comes change, so let's all choose to challenge.
8.moreInfo: A challenged world is an alert world and from challenge comes change.bSo let's all choose to challenge. How will you help forge a gender equal world? Celebrate women's achievement. Raise awareness against bias. Take action for equality

9.title: Covid-19’s Impact on People in Prison
9.subtitle: People who are incarcerated are at great risk of sickness and death as a result of the Covid-19 pandemic and more must be done to release people who are imprisoned and are not a threat to public safety or are elderly or infirm.

9.title: Ujamaa Lighting
9.subtitle: Although light bulbs are considered a commodity, the Ujamaa Lighting brand aspires to bring its own unique take on the lighting industry. Founded in June 2019, Ujamaa Lighting, specializes residential, commercial, and industrial LED lighting solutions.

products.name: Ujamaa Smart LED Light Bulb
products.description: Our customers spoke, and we listened!  Ujamaa Lighting is proud to introduce our version of the Smart Light.

products.name: #BLACKOUT T-Shirt
products.description: The #BLACKOUT movement was organized to bring awareness to police brutality and racism towards the African-American people. This t-shirt was designed in honor of the efforts to bring peace and equality to Black people worldwide.

products.name: Ujamaa Hoodie (Word Logo - Gold)
products.description: Crafted for comfort, this lighter weight sweatshirt is perfect for relaxing. Once put on, it will be impossible to take off.

10.title: How we can make racism a solvable problem --- and improve policing
10.subtitle: When we define racism as behaviors instead of feelings, we can measure it -- and transform it from an impossible problem into a solvable one, says justice scientist Dr. Phillip Atiba Goff. In an actionable talk, he shares his work at the Center for Policing Equity, an organization that helps police departments diagnose and track racial gaps in policing in order to eliminate them.

10.title: Oh-Mazing!
10.subtitle: Yes, we sell granola (it's quite tasty), but more importantly, we want to inspire you to live your life with purpose, passion, and to follow your dreams. Our products are here to bring the adventure back to snacking, and better yet, celebrate YOU when those dreams are achieved.

products.name: Original Recipe
products.description: The Original Recipe blend has a sweet caramel flavor that makes it simply delicious. There are so many ways to enjoy this treat--topping on your yogurt, adding some crunch to your favorite ice cream, or creating a crust for a cheesecake.

products.name: Lemon Bar
products.description: Lemon Bar will please the palate of all lemon lovers and add a refreshing flavor to a bowl of oatmeal or a new bite to your favorite cheesecake recipe.

products.name: Caribbean Delight
products.description: Caribbean Delight is our first vegan product. The ingredients include coconut oil, grated coconut, and a touch of raisins that will make your palate dance. Not to mention, you will immediately be reminded of that time you went on an island vacation.

11.title: Build for Black Lives
11.subtitle: Are you an anti-racist designer, developer, data scientist, or marketing specialist interested in committing to pro bono projects to work towards reparations and racial justice? Work on one of our available projects.

11.title: The Hate U Give
11.subtitle: Based on the best-selling novel, The Hate U Give tells the story of Starr Carter, who lives in two worlds: the poor, black neighborhood where she resides and the mostly white prep school she attends. This uneasy balance is shattered when she witnesses the fatal shooting of her childhood friend by a policeman. Facing pressures from all sides, Starr must find her voice and stand up for what’s right.

12.title: Carter G. Woodson - African American Trailblazers in Virginia History
12.subtitle: Enjoy a six-minute podcast on the life of Carter G. Woodson who helped start the first Negro History Week.

12.title: Hoodietowel
12.subtitle: Super soft, absorbent microfiber towel. Sized just right for optimal flexibility 100% cotton. Machine wash. Imported

13.title: Remembering South African leader Nelson Mandela
13.subtitle: Nelson Mandela, the first black president of South Africa credited with ending apartheid there, died in Johannesburg on Dec. 5, 2013. Former PBS NewsHour correspondent Charlayne Hunter-Gault takes a look back at Mandela's life and legacy.

13.title: Plum Good
13.subtitle: Plum Good locally produces, discriminately sources and proudly brings to market the highest quality culinary and restorative spices, herbs and tea blends available. Our mission is to help bring flavorful nutrition available to our customers.  We make All Natural rubs and blends, teas, jams and sauces.

products.name: Paprika Lime Blend
products.description: This SALT FREE blend of citrus, paprika, garlic, and lime gives color, zest, and mouth watering flavor to fish, chicken, and poultry.

products.name: Organic Chai Tea
products.description: Black Tea, Ginger, Cardamom, Cloves, Peppercorns Cinnamon

products.name: Sweet & Hot Chocolate Sauce
products.description: A culinary gourmet delight for cooks and foodies alike! Choice serrano and chocolate peppers, dark chocolate, balsamic vinegar, raw sugar, cardamom and water make a mouthwatering marinade, topping or accompaniment and make everything it comes into contact with delicious.

14.title: I Wear African
14.subtitle: I Wear African is a campaign initiative created to promote and celebrate the contemporary African lifestyle by bringing the best quality Afrocentric brands to our fans.

products.name: Hector Rectangular Indoor Lumbar Pillow
products.description: Artfully inspiring and beautiful, the Lumbar Pillow bolsters your home instantly and effortlessly while evoking bohemian style. Made in the USA, the classic rectangular silhouette of the pillow is filled with a feather down insert and is covered with a quality linen blend fabric.

products.name: African Print Dashiki T-Shirt White
products.description: The D’iyanu white dashiki t-shirt is perfect for those hot summer days! Stay cool and look great with this dashiki t-shirt which features an ultra soft feel and unique center front and sleeve details. This will become an instant favorite in your closet, and one of your most worn shirts in the hot summer!

products.name: Women African Print Yellow Long Puff Sleeve Dress
products.description: Handmade, 100% cotton, Afronista dress. Available in sizes 2-14.

14.title: Post 21
14.subtitle: Post 21 was created by a Mother-Daughter duo who wanted a comprehensive marketplace that focused on products from Black-owned businesses. They felt strongly that there’s no reason why these products are consistently being discovered when they should be household names. So, they said let’s create the place we want to shop.

products.name: Dog Treat Poppers
products.description: All natural dog treat poppers. Comes in 3 delicious flavors. Peanut Butter

products.name: B is for Black Boy
products.description: B is for Black Boy was written to celebrate the awe-inspiring nature of the Black male. It speaks life into our Black boys and empowers them to manifest their highest potential. It's intended to author and assert positive representation of Black boys to all audiences.

products.name: Headband
products.description: Handmade upcycled padded headband, with satin ribbon on underside next to hair.

15.title: American Civil Liberties Union
15.subtitle: Donate to the ACLU. The ACLU has been at the center of nearly every major civil liberties battle in the U.S. for over 100 years. This vital work depends on the support of ACLU members in all 50 states and beyond.

15.title: Grace X Originals LLC
15.subtitle: Grace X Originals is a "Slow Fashion" Streetwear & Lifestyle Brand. We take our time to expertly hand-dye our textiles and apply high-end airbrush artistry to our designs with sustainable fashion practices foremost in mind.

16.title: Netflix Explained: Racial Wealth Gap
16.subtitle: Cory Booker and others discuss how slavery, housing discrimination and centuries of inequality have compounded to create a racial wealth gap.

16.title: Namascents Candle Co
16.subtitle: Namascents Candle Co crafts candles and home fragrance products for any space; welcoming peace, stillness and good thoughts. Our inspiration is nature, love + memories. We keep it clean + simple with a scentful twist.

17.title: Abolish Prison Labor in the USA
17.subtitle: Prison labor is a form of modern American slavery used by multiple large corporations across the world. Under the 13th Amendment to the United States Constitution, slavery was merely reformed rather than abolished. Racial justice in the USA cannot be achieved until prison labor is abolished completely.

17.title: Hiram Rhodes Revels - Biography
17.subtitle: A freeman his entire life, Hiram Rhodes Revels was the first African American to serve in the U.S. Congress. With his moderate political orientation and oratorical skills honed from years as a preacher, Revels filled a vacant seat in the United States Senate in 1870.

18.title: How students of color confront impostor syndrome
18.subtitle: As a black woman from a tough part of the Bronx who grew up to attain all the markers of academic prestige, Dena Simmons knows that for students of color, success in school sometimes comes at the cost of living authentically. Now an educator herself, Simmons discusses how we might create a classroom that makes all students feel proud of who they are.

18.title: Beija Flor Naturals
18.subtitle: Beija-Flor Naturals has nearly a decade as a Curly Girl favorite product line in addition to skincare that is effective, exotic and unique in the green beauty market.

products.name: Body and Hair Honey
products.description: Moisturizing Butter + Oils blend to give a nourishing sheen to skin and hair.  Only a little goes a long way and the fragrance is divine.

products.name: Acai Mango Lotion
products.description: The acai mango lotion is a rich and creamy facial moisturizer that is perfect for all skin types. This water-based product absorbs perfectly, and includes the all powerful acai and mango extracts, murumuru butter, rosemary and orange essential oils.

products.name: Handmade Soy Candle: Plum
products.description: Juicy Fruit fragrance without being too sticky sweet. This plum inspired candle features notes of peace, apple, strawberry, jasmine and vanilla.  Clean burning soy candle. 90 Hour Burn Time.

19.title: Buttaz & Wax
19.subtitle: Buttaz & Wax is a handcrafted body butter and personal care line that came about after founder Keisha Marie made one of her body butters and her eight year old daughter looked up at her and said "mommy these are good, you should sell them".

products.name: Coco Loco Body Butter
products.description: Apply to any area of the body as needed. Best used after a shower when skin is still a bit damp. The butters and oils will lock moisture from shower into your skin.

products.name: Beard Oil
products.description: Work 3-5 drops of our beard oil into your hair revive your beard. Best used right after a shower while your beard is still damp

products.name: Lavender Soap
products.description: Our Lavender handcrafted soap, just like our Lavender bathsalts, smells like calming Lavender.

19.title: Nia the Loc God
19.subtitle: A natural oil that your hair will love. You are one step closer to moisturized, shiny, healthy hair that smells amazing.

products.name: Loc God Stimulating Oil 4oz
products.description: This stimulating oils is the perfect item to add to your haircare routine. 100% natural, also smells 100% like lemongrass essential oils.  This product is extremely light and will leave your scalp itch free.

products.name: The Loc God Hydration Mist 9oz
products.description: This hydration mist is the perfect item to add to your haircare routine. 100% natural, also smells 100% like lavender essential oils.  This product will leave your hair super soft and give you an extra boost of hydration and shine.

products.name: The Loc God Scalp Renewal Cleansing Shampoo (Lemongrass)
products.description: Deep cleansing shampoo, with a luxurious smell that will leave your hair clean and not feeling stripped. This shampoo is 100% natural. It will help with dandruff, irritated and or itchy scalp.

20.title: How to deconstruct racism, one headline at a time
20.subtitle: Baratunde Thurston explores the phenomenon of white Americans calling the police on black Americans who have committed the crimes of ... eating, walking or generally "living while black." In this profound, thought-provoking and often hilarious talk, he reveals the power of language to change stories of trauma into stories of healing -- while challenging us all to level up.

20.title: Very Puzzled
20.subtitle: As a parent it can be quite challenging to find items such as books and toys that are representative of the diverse society that we live in.  It is important that children see other people that look different to themselves in the books and toys that they interact with to ensure that they appreciate their own heritage and respect the heritage and culture of others.

products.name: 100 piece Africa Map Giant Jigsaw Puzzle
products.description: Puzzles are really great way for you and your extended family to bond with a child.  The very puzzled Africa Map Puzzle is definitely something that you can get stuck into that is rewarding with 100 pieces and each country on the continent of Africa is represented with a variety of landmarks, monuments and attractions it will provide endless fun and topics of discussion that can be used as fun way to learn for both children and adults.

products.name: Ethiopia colour-in t-shirt
products.description: The Ethiopia colour-in t-shirt makes perfect gift for any child with a creative edge or a group activity for parties or play dates.⁠

products.name: Ghana Map Poster
products.description: The Very Puzzled Ghana map poster is an A2 poster that accurately reflects the map of Ghana each region of Ghana is represented with a variety of landmarks, monuments and attractions it will provide endless fun and topics of discussion that can be used as fun way to learn for both children and adults.

21.title: Me and White Supremacy
21.subtitle: Based on the viral Instagram challenge that captivated participants worldwide, Me and White Supremacy takes readers on a 28-day journey, complete with journal prompts, to do the necessary and vital work that can ultimately lead to improving race relations.

21.title: Olamina Botanicals
21.subtitle: We are a Black femme-owned apothecary crafting tinctures, teas, syrups and salves in unceded Lenni Lenape territory. Our mission is to help people ground into their own innate power as healers, draw strength from the plant world—and act on behalf of the planet.

products.name: Fire Cider - Immune Tonic
products.description: Fire Cider is a spicy, garlicky, alcohol-free folk immunity remedy that can be taken daily to ward off the sniffles.

products.name: Sore Throat Spray
products.description: Tingle and tickle the microorganisms responsible for your sore throat into oblivion with our Sore Throat Spray.

products.name: Sweet Dreams - Sleep Tonic
products.description: Formulated to help one ease into peaceful slumber, Sweet Dreams features reputed nervine Hops, a sedative that induces deep sleep without headache or groggy feeling upon waking.

22.title: Shop Thoughtful
22.subtitle: thoughtful is a nonprofit that seeks to promote black businesses and create a one-stop-shop for consumers who want to vote with their wallets. thoughtful does not take any commissions off of the businesses it promotes, it is purely a hub designed to uplift and support established Black-owned businesses online.

products.name: Scrunchie Set
products.description: You're all set for gym class and everything in between with these soft scrunchie ponytail holder.

products.name: Black Trans Lives
products.description: #BlackTransLivesMatter

products.name: Nano-Ionic Facial Steamer
products.description: Facial steam combined with ionic water particles is up to 10x more effective than other facial steamers in penetrating the skin.

22.title: Gentleman AF
22.subtitle: Gentleman AF is a beard care line featuring a beard wash, beard oils, and beard balms for classy men with a dash of savagery.

products.name: Beard Balms
products.description: Scoop a dime sized amount of beard balm with your finger and place it in the palm of your hands. Rub it between both palms until it melts. Apply it to your beard, comb it down and style as desired.

products.name: Beard Wash
products.description: Wet your face and neck, place a small amount of beard wash in the palm of your hands and massage it into your beard and face, including your neck. Rinse your beard thoroughly.

products.name: Beard Oils
products.description: Shake well before use. Drop a dime sized amount of beard oil in the palm of your hands. Rub your hands and apply the oil from your skin to the tip of your beard.

23.title: Mystic Momma
23.subtitle: Specializing in teas, tinctures, yoni steams, sitz baths, blends for hormone balance, reproductive health and womb wellness.

products.name: Vital-A-Tea
products.description: In TCM, the heart is said to house the Shen. Shen is best described as the spirit/soul, but also encompasses the  mind. So what better way to revitalize Shen then to experience this high vitamin and mineral tea full of heart healthy herbs!

products.name: Ultimate Gold body butter
products.description: This hydrating aloe and shea body butter is an indulgent treat for the body.  Layer over skin after a warm shower. May refrigerate this body butter for a cooling effect and longer shelf life.

products.name: Cleansing Herbs
products.description: The Mystic Momma Cleansing Herbs includes a strong dose of herbs to help clean out the uterus and improve blood circulation to the mid-section. The herbs included promote circulation, balance the vaginal flora, improve scent, tighten skin, clear out excess mucus and nourish the reproductive organs.

23.title: Biased: Uncovering the Hidden Prejudice That Shapes What We See, Think, and Do
23.subtitle: With a perspective that is at once scientific, investigative, and informed by personal experience, Dr. Jennifer Eberhardt offers us the language and courage we need to face one of the biggest and most troubling issues of our time.

24.title: Jarvis Boards
24.subtitle: Jarvis Boards' mission has always been to craft paddle boards in Austin, Texas that are environmentally friendly, look great, and perform well. To accomplish this, we employ a wide range of techniques to craft our small-batch production wooden SUPs in our Austin studio.

products.name: Hollow Core Paddle Board Frame Kits
products.description: There is something magical about creating something with your own two hands. Building your own hollow core paddle board will be one of the most rewarding projects that you'll tackle.

products.name: Let's Surf Y'all! Dad hat
products.description: Let's Surf Y'all! Dad hats aren't just for dads. This one's got a low profile with an adjustable strap and curved visor. Available in khaki and light blue.

products.name: Surf Wax Candle
products.description: We teamed up with our friends at Jimbo's Surf Wax to create a unique line of surf wax candles. Each candle is slow cooked over a wood stove in Maine using surf wax and a hint of coconut.

24.title: Robert Tanner Freeman - Bytes of History
24.subtitle: Robert Tanner Freeman was born in Washington DC in 1846. He was the son of slaves who had bought their freedom in the 19th century. Historical records are unclear but they probably adopted the surname Freeman in response to their transition.

25.title: Krem au Krem, LLC
25.subtitle: Krem au Krem specialize in body butters, hair & body oils, lip balms, sugar scrubs, pomades, beard care, and much more! These products are 100% vegan, natural, plant-based, chemical/toxin free, cruelty free, & made with passion!

products.name: Whipped Body & Hair Butter
products.description: Homemade whipped body butter with all-natural ingredients designed to keep your skin hydrated, youthful, and healthy. This butter has many benefits to use such as relieving sensitive skin conditions such as dry skin, eczema, baby rashes, hyper-pigmentation, discoloration, bug bites, dark marks, stretch marks, etc.

products.name: Scented Pomade
products.description: Pomades are a great supplemental moisturizer (for body butter) in the summer months. This can be shipped in the mail without being affected by the heat. It is multi-use and can be used to moisturize your lips, hands, skin, hair, and beards!

products.name: Lip Balm
products.description: Organic Natural Lip Balm that is homemade and great for dry lips or any lips. The ingredients listed below were all included to keep your lips smooth, full, and healthy even after application!

25.title: BAH NICA
25.subtitle: Where the serene aquamarine seas meet the amber volcanic lava. Where resilience meets creative passion. In it's simplest form, it's truly the defining moment where elegance and excellence meet.

26.title: Puzzle Huddle
26.subtitle: Kids grow up fast! Stay connected and hear about new puzzle designs and discounts. We promise not to spam you because we're too busy with potty training and coloring books.

products.name: XL Chemistry Girl Kids' Puzzle
products.description: The XL Chemistry Girls' Puzzle was created to inspire and affirm children using a creative format. This puzzle measures 14n x 19.5in, includes 100 pieces, and is constructed from sturdy cardboard similar to most puzzles sold in stores. Depending on a child’s fine motor skills, the puzzle can be ideal toddlers or young children.

products.name: Future President - Oval Office
products.description: The Future President - Oval Office Puzzle measures 12in x 16.5in, includes 54 pieces, and is constructed from sturdy cardboard similar to most puzzles sold in stores. Depending on a child’s development and fine motor skills, this puzzle can be ideal toddlers or young children.

products.name: XL Noah's Ark Kids' Puzzle
products.description: The XL Noah's Ark Kids Puzzle was created to inspire and affirm children using a creative format. This puzzle measures 14in x 19.5in, includes 100 pieces, and is constructed from sturdy cardboard similar to most puzzles sold in stores. Depending on a child’s fine motor skills, the puzzle can be ideal toddlers or young children.

26.title: Loza Tam
26.subtitle: Shop our collection of women's African Head Wraps. All of our head wraps & turbans are lined in satin to protect the hair against frizz, breakage and moisture loss.

products.name: Black Satin Head Wrap
products.description: Black, Pre-tied Satin Turban Head Wrap is made completely of black satin to prevent friction between the cotton fabric and your fragile hair strands. Features an elastic band in the back to ensure a the turban stays secure on your head.

products.name: Faiza Turban Headband
products.description: Black, purple, and lemon yellow headband is lined in black satin to prevent friction between the cotton fabric and your fragile hair strands.  Turban headband is perfect to wear on your next Peloton ride or wear it casually on your next Zoom meeting.

products.name: Lulu African Headband
products.description: Black, white, and grey African Printed Head Wrap Headband is lined in black satin to prevent friction between the cotton fabric and your fragile hair strands. Perfect to wear on your next Peloton ride or wear it casually on your next Zoom meeting.

27.title: Double Dutch Dolls
27.subtitle: Through Fashion and Fun encourage young girls to explore and appreciate each other’s differences and similarities. Beauty comes in all shades and the brand seeks to create a community that celebrates the multicultural beauty of every child.

products.name: 18" African American Fashion Doll- Zaria Bradley
products.description: Hi! My name is Zaria Bradley. I am Kaila’s levelheaded, laidback twin-sister. My personal style is "classic cool". I’m into Soccer, Science, and keeping Kaila out of trouble, which is a huge job. I am in the 8th grade at Stylesboro Middle school. I am Captain of the Stingrays soccer team, President of the Science Club. I’ve got my future all planned out with a soccer scholarship, HBCU undergrad and med school.

products.name: 18" African American Fashion Doll- Kaila Bradley
products.description: Hi! My name is Kaila Bradley and I love fashion. I am the creative mind behind the Double Dutch Dolls hip style. A budding fashionista, I design all of our clothes and have plans to launch my own fashion line, named none other than "Double Dutch Dolls" in honor of me and my also fabulous sister, Zaria. I am in the 8th grade at Stylesboro Middle school and Co-captain of the Stingrays Cheerleading team.

products.name: Double Dutch Dolls Book 1- "Double Dare"
products.description: Navigating middle school can be tricky. But, 14-year old twins Kaila and Zaria Bradley, known to everyone as the Double Dutch Dolls, seem to have it all figured out.

27.title: Blow Candle Co.
27.subtitle: Blow Candle Co. is a company on a mission to support and uplift women! A grief hobby turned empowerment project, Blow is carrying on the legacy of my late brother DaVaughn, who’s lifelong duty was to help and encourage others.

products.name: Signature Collection
products.description: Introducing our Signature Collection! Seven carefully curated scents to inspire, relax and delight! Our candles are made from an all natural coconut wax blend, phthalate and paraben free fragrances and eco friendly, cotton braided wicks for a clean burn.

products.name: The Essence Collection
products.description: A collection of deep and complex fragrance blends. An ode to Womxn, everywhere.

products.name: Signature Collection
products.description: These sweet little wax truffles last 3-5 days per piece depending on the average time of use.

28.title: Kultured Misfits
28.subtitle: Kultured Misfits is a lifestyle, sport and ready-to-wear brand based out of Atlanta, Georgia. With a heavy influence from culture found in music, film, and art, we are driven to create timeless work by portraying an aesthetic that is uniquely our own to impact our everyday life.

products.name: Kultured Misfits Tracksuit (Crew + Joggers)
products.description: Classic Kultured Misfits tracksuIt set with matching crewneck and jogger pants in black. A comfortable cotton mix jogger, featuring embroidered Kultured Misfits logo on the left chest and thigh. Drawstring waist and cuffed hems.

products.name: Legalize Free College (Do Tha Right Thang) T-Shirt
products.description: Every sale of a Legalize Free College product will contribute to the "Legalize Free College Scholarship"!

products.name: MISFIT Embossed Crewneck
products.description: Premium crewneck is cut from French terry jersey. With the embossed cursive logo adds a signature finishing touch to its classic design.

28.title: National Bail Out
28.subtitle: National Bail Out is a Black-led and Black-centered collective of abolitionist organizers, lawyers and activists building a community-based movement to support our folks and end systems of pretrial detention and ultimately mass incarceration. We are people who have been impacted by cages — either by being in them ourselves or witnessing our families and loved ones be encaged. We are queer, trans, young, elder, and immigrant.

29.title: 11 Black Athletes Who Made Winter Olympic History
29.subtitle: Black Olympic athletes come from a long line of pioneers who made it possible for them to compete and win at the Olympics. And even though the Olympic Games have been around for centuries, there are still Black athletes who become the first to compete in their sport at the Olympics.

29.title: Amazing Essence
29.subtitle: Amazing Essence is a Philadelphia based, one-woman small business built on a dream of entrepreneurship. Our handcrafted products are created using 100% soy wax without additives, natural (lead-free) cotton wick and high quality fragrance oils without phthalates or additives.

products.name: 25 oz. Triple Wick Candle Bowl
products.description: The Amazing Essence 25 oz. candle bowls are handcrafted using natural soy wax, high quality fragrance oils without phthalates and a natural cotton wick to ensure a clean, toxic-free burn in your home or office.

products.name: 4oz. Linen Spray
products.description: Mist our handcrafted linen sprays into the air liberally to Relax, Balance or Uplift your senses. When misting Linen, Spray 7 inches away and only on washable fabric. Contains essential oils/highly quality fragrance oils.

products.name: 8oz. Herbal Candles
products.description: The Amazing Essence 8 oz. herbal candles are handcrafted using natural soy wax, and fused with dried herbs, high quality fragrance oils without phthalates and a natural cotton wick to ensure a clean, toxic-free burn in your home or office. Approx 40hr of burn time.

30.title: Innocence Project
30.subtitle: Donate to help free the innocent in 2020. Be a part of the Innocence Project’s groundbreaking work to free innocent people and transform the legal system. With your support, we can do even more in 2020 — donate today.

30.title: Doe Wiz Apparel
30.subtitle: Doe Wiz apparel was found by Kamar Doe Wiz Lewis. The term Doe came about from the street meaning "Money," and the term "Wiz" short for wisdom. By combining the two terms, we have the name "Doe Wiz" which means "A smart way to get money."

products.name: DWA Cream or White Hoodie
products.description: Casual spot pullover hoodie - loose fit. Choosing this stylish pull over hoodie will add comfort good for exercise, fitness, workout, running, jogging, sportswear etc.

products.name: DWA Grape Purple Yellow Cropped Top Set
products.description: Casual sport sweat suit round neck pullover top long pants, loose fit. Choosing this stylish two-piece suit will make you more attractive. Suit casual, exercise, fitness, workout, running, jogging, sportswear etc.

products.name: DWA Varsity Set Red
products.description: Snap closure. Contrast sleeves. Knitted collar, cuffs and waistband with stripe details. Press-stud closure. Contrast studs. Hidden ear phone loops.
